channel.title: Website on Gazoo.vrv
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Gazoo.vrv

item.title: A New Host, Server and Site Generator
item.description: And we are back! It must be a year now since my old site donw.org went dark for many reasons, including being busy working on my own game. There’s some big changes with this new setup: I own the domain donw.io this time round. I’ve gone through a bunch of domains – donw.org, donw.co.uk, etc. – that I used to pay somebody else to manage for me. That was obviously not the right way of going about this as I no longer own them.
